title: Cast Thy Burden on the Lord
author: F. J. Van Alstyne

verses.text:
Cast thy burden on the Lord, And he shall sustain thee;
He will make the promise good, He will sustain thee.

Cast thy burden on the Lord, Though thy heart be breaking;
Trust in him, he will sustain, He will sustain thee.

Cast thy burden on the Lord, He will not forsake thee;
He will make the promise good, He will sustain thee.

Cast thy burden on the Lord, God thy burden shall bear;
He will make the promise good, He will sustain thee.

chorus.text:
He will sustain thee, He will sustain thee;
He never will permit the righteous to be moved.
